casebody.data:
WILKIE
v.
CITY OF BOILING SPRING LAKES 44PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 16, 2017 James P. Cauley, III, Attorney at Law, Wilson, David M. Rief, Attorney at Law, Geneva L. Yourse, Attorney at Law, Cary, Jack Cozort, Attorney at Law, for City of Boiling Spring Lakes. Kurt Blaine Fryar, Attorney at Law, for Wilkie, Edward F., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of May 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of May 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 5th day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
